pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============et-micc-build=============`Micc-build <https://github.com/etijskens/et-micc-build>`_ is a companion to `Micc <https://github.com/etijskens/et-micc>`_ aiming at building binary extensionmodules written in C++ or Fortran. * Free software: MIT license* Documentation: https://et-micc-build.readthedocs.io.
